Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: shiny white light with blue outer color
divs: Sighting Detailsit hovered for 9 seconds, then lowered down and raised up again left to right and hovered and shot out towards right then shot out at a high rate of speed towards the left and then it hovered for a few seconds and went down slowly. It did this three times. I was in City Of Industry and it seemed liked it could be over the La Habra or furher south. I was standing in the back yard of a friends home and I brought it to their attention and they saw the second event. In total it lasted approximate five minutes. I noticed because it was so shiny like I have never seen before and moved so quickly like I had never seen. I thought it was a UFO. I almost didn't want to write this because I felt silly, but what I saw was something I will never forget or I have ever experienced. If some one else had this experience please, I would like to know.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Industry
There were no other sightings in Industry on or around August 22nd 2008
